content:
Q: What does Maid Protect360 PRO cover?
A: Maid Protect360 PRO provides comprehensive and high-value coverage for all employers and their domestic helpers in Singapore. Our maid insurance plan covers payout on Hospital and Surgical Expenses, Personal Accident protection, Alternative Maid services, Waiver of 25% Co-Payment (for Enhanced plans and above) and even outpatient privileges for the maid with subsidised consultation fee for medical and dental services.
questions: What types of medical expenses are covered under Maid Protect360 PRO, and how do hospital, surgical, and outpatient benefits interact within the plan?
How does the Personal Accident protection in Maid Protect360 PRO apply to domestic helpers, and what scenarios would trigger this coverage?
In what circumstances can an employer claim Alternative Maid services under Maid Protect360 PRO, and are there any conditions or limits to this benefit?
What is the Waiver of 25% Co-Payment feature in Maid Protect360 PRO, which plan tiers include it, and how does it affect the employer's out-of-pocket costs?
How are outpatient privileges structured in Maid Protect360 PRO, specifically regarding subsidised consultation fees for medical and dental services for the maid?
Does Maid Protect360 PRO cover both inpatient and outpatient medical treatments for domestic helpers, and how are these benefits coordinated?
Are there any exclusions or limitations to the Personal Accident protection within Maid Protect360 PRO that employers should be aware of?
How does the coverage for surgical expenses under Maid Protect360 PRO handle pre-existing conditions or elective procedures for domestic helpers?
What documentation or proof is required to claim Alternative Maid services under Maid Protect360 PRO, and are there any timing restrictions for making such claims?
How does the Waiver of 25% Co-Payment in Maid Protect360 PRO interact with other co-payment or deductible clauses in the plan?
Are outpatient dental services covered under Maid Protect360 PRO, and if so, what are the limits or conditions for these benefits?
Can the subsidised consultation fees for outpatient medical and dental services under Maid Protect360 PRO be used at any clinic, or are there network restrictions?
Does Maid Protect360 PRO provide coverage for medical expenses incurred overseas, or is it limited to treatments within Singapore?
How does Maid Protect360 PRO define a domestic helper for eligibility of coverage, and are there any age or employment status restrictions?
What happens if the domestic helper requires both hospitalisation and outpatient treatment within the same claim period under Maid Protect360 PRO?
Are there any general exclusions in Maid Protect360 PRO that override the listed benefits such as hospital expenses or personal accident coverage?
How does Maid Protect360 PRO handle claims related to dental injuries resulting from accidents compared to routine dental care?
Is there a maximum payout limit for hospital and surgical expenses under Maid Protect360 PRO, and how does this affect high-cost medical treatments?
Does Maid Protect360 PRO cover alternative maid services only when the insured maid is hospitalised, or are other scenarios included?
How does the plan ensure that the waiver of 25% co-payment applies only to eligible claims, and what documentation is required to verify this?
